remarks: Express the predicate ` F ` converges to ` 0 ` .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
statement:
clim0.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
clim0.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
clim0.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
clim0.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = B ) $.
clim0c.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> B e. CC ) $.
clim0c $p |- ( ph -> ( F ~~> 0 <-> A. x e. RR+ E. j e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( abs ` B ) < x ) ) $.
$d F j k x $.
$d M j $.
$d Z j k $.
$d j k ph x $.
